bwwExcerpt: Clarke captures that survivor's drive, as well as the aching vulnerability that bubbles up under the cool, sophisticated exterior. This Holly is still in her teens, after all - a kid who had to grow up fast, she's putting on airs. "She's such a goddamn liar," says her Hollywood agent pal, OJ Berman (Lee Wilkof), "maybe she don't know herself anymore."
